text: Mago'a vahe'mo'za tamasamiza Ramofo kna hago fore hu'ne hu'za tamasamisazo, mago vahe'mo huno Ruotge Avamumo e'inahu kasnampa kea nasamie huge, mago ke huama nehuno hanio, mago vahe'mo huno, e'inahukna avona hamprita keteta huama hunema hanageta, e'inahu kema antahisutma, antri nehutma ame hutma antahintahi tamifina antahigna osiho.
